item.title: :bullettrain_side: Interrail 2023: Denmark, Sweden, Germany, The Netherlands, Belgium
item.description: This summer, I did my second Interrail trip. With an Interrail pass, you can travel with many different trains throughout Europe with little to no additional cost. In this post, I will share some pictures I made during this trip through 5 different countries, as well as share the route and trains I have taken.
